dcterms:creator: R. Lowe
N. Pow
I. Serban
J. Pineau
dcterms:description: The Ubuntu Dialogue Corpus is an English dataset collected from chat logs of the Ubuntu Forum, consisting of 1 million context-response pairs for training, 0.5 million pairs for validation, and 0.5 million pairs for testing.
dcterms:title: Ubuntu Dialogue Corpus

dcterms:creator: Y. Wu
W. Wu
C. Xing
M. Zhou
Z. Li
dcterms:description: The Douban Conversation Corpus is a multi-turn Chinese conversation dataset consisting of 1 million context-response pairs for training, 50 thousand pairs for validation, and 6,670 pairs for testing.
dcterms:title: Douban Conversation Corpus
